AD_BrokenHeart.synopsis: A goblin lost his trousers after being seduced, and is wandering around his tribe's camp sulking.

AD_BrokenHeart_1.speaker: Tracker Klagga
AD_BrokenHeart_1.text: Stole my heart, and my pants...

AD_BrokenHeart_0.speaker: Tracker Klagga
AD_BrokenHeart_0.text: ... at least the Absolute loves me.
AD_BrokenHeart_0.context: NodeContext: trying to cheer himself up
